job_description:
• Life at Salesforce Our Locations Our Locations North America Europe, Middle East, and Africa Asia Pacific Latin America Our Teams Our Teams Sales Technology & Product Customer Success Corporate Roles AI Research University University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager Talent Programs Talent Programs Overview Future Pathways India Return to Work Military Fellows Own the implementation of standard configurations and custom development, and data migration elements of a Salesforce implementationLead deployment strategies during the project development as defined by our architectural layer (Source Code Management, and Deployment Standards)Apply troubleshooting strategies to identify and fix implementational issues.
• Org Sustainability Investors Give us your Feedback 3+ years of development experience on the Salesforce.
• Com platformExperience on agile methodologiesAlgorithm-oriented and logical mentality.
• Knowledge of Javascript / Front-end design (HTML and CSS)Experience in Programmatic (Apex, LWC, Javascript) and Declarative (Low code) salesforce development.
• Experience in Salesforce deployment practices/strategiesExperience delivering projects using Salesforce Communications Cloud technologyExperienced in GitHub and branches manipulationSalesforce Administrator CertificationSalesforce App Builder CertificationIntermediate English speaker Sitemap Legal Terms of Service Privacy Information Responsible Disclosure Trust Contact Manage Preferences Salesforce Javascript Developer CertificationSalesforce Omni Studio ConsultantDedication to time and tasksCollaborate to Drive SuccessWork well in group Demonstrate Business InsightDisplay Emotional IntelligenceHighly motivated and results-orientedEngage in Fearless ConversationsManage AmbiguitySolve Problems Creatively University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager Health Insurance for the family groupParental LeaveChildcare subsidiesWellness perks Education ReimbursementMeals voucherAnd more.
• Ability to work in an agile and collaborative environment and follow our Professional Services MethodologyWorking remotely, while collaborating with global teams for delivery across geographies.
• Collaborate and act as a Team Lead for multiples projects, being a Technical reference to our entire implementation team Our Story Newsroom Blog Careers Trust Salesforce.
